items.sentence: Tom says he hopes Mary doesn't need to do that.
Tom says he hopes Mary doesn't have to do that.
Tom says he doesn't think Mary really did that.
Tom doesn't have me to do that for him anymore.
Tom doesn't have many opportunities to do that.
Tom didn't tell me why he wanted me to do that.
Tom didn't know that he didn't need to do that.
Tom didn't know that he didn't have to do that.
Tom didn't know that I was supposed to do that.
Tom did that here yesterday for the first time.
Tom could've refused to do that, but he didn't.
Tom continued to do that until the day he died.
Tom admitted he didn't want to do that anymore.
You think Tom will do that for Mary, don't you?
You asked Tom to help Mary do that, didn't you?
Tom wouldn't tell Mary why he wouldn't do that.
Tom would stop doing that if Mary asked him to.
Tom would like you to show Mary how to do that.
Tom wondered where Mary learned how to do that.
Tom won't likely tell Mary he wants to do that.
